# Example dynamic group matching rules

ALL { instance.compartment.id = 'ocid1.compartment.oc1..example', resource.type = 'instance' }

ANY { resource.type = 'instance', resource.type = 'cluster' }

# single-predicate form
instance.compartment.id = 'ocid1.compartment.oc1..example'

# presence check form
tag.department.operations.value
